data.name: Campsite Simulator
data.detailed_description:
let's develop together


About the Game

Campsite Simulator, It is a simulation game in which you can operate a camping area, cafe and various sports activities on a summer beach.
You can start by cleaning your space and buying new tables and chairs.
With the income you earn from the cafe, you can buy products that can be a new source of income.

In the cafe you can give people lemonade toast etc. Yes we sold. After that?
Yes, you can organize new events where you can play the game without getting bored. For example, you can earn more money by buying ATVs and having people take ATV tours.
There are many ways to make people who want to camp happy. You can offer them a tent service or rent a surfboard, but remember, your goal is to give people the best service.
In the meantime, do not forget to open a parking area for the guests :)

Of course there will be bully people. You should take precautions against these and you may need an employee.
People here love to drink and have fun, but it can have some downsides.

data.short_description: With Campsite Simulator, you can build your dream campsite. Set up a cafe at the campsite, buy tents, and focus on growing by serving customers!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Turkish, Danish, Korean, Polish, Norwegian, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10-capable GPU
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
